attributes.action: CREATE A SUPERMARKET/RETAIL STORE WATCHDOG TO ENSURE UNIFORM ADHERANCE TO 'THE SALE OF GOODS ACT 1978/9' AND MONITOR THEIR SITE AQUISITION AND IMPACT ON LOCAL BUSINESSES..MORE POWER FOR THE OFFICE OF FAIR TRADING NEEDED..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would like to see coherence of the 'Sale of Goods Act' being enforced across the Supermarkets/General retail stores in a uniform manner, and MORE POWER TO THE OFFICE OF FAIR TRADING NEEDED. There seems to be variations of the correct interpretation to this act - with some stores making their own Policy to fob off customers with genuine grievances.

Reports of large Supermarkets, buying up possible store building sites, before obtaining plannning, to prevent other rivals moving into an area are growing.  This should be classed as unfair trading practice, and stopped..Please sign -

rejection.details: Please reduce your use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
